price: mmoo isa samii olii sodaa dhabdanii? bubbee cirracha qabu isin irratti erguu. Akeekkachiisni Kiyya akkam akka ta'e beekuuf jirtu.
arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
